comments:
Description:
NPE when delete an empty group in cube in attached report.
Build number:2.2.0.v200706011347

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report.
2. Edit regioncredit cube.
3. Select static amount group and click Delete button.

Expected result:
The empty group is deleted.

Actual result:
NPE

I will check the code about it.
